definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: These anaesthesia medicines are under the special control of the superior management departments.
sentences.chinese: 神經麻醉作用的藥品由上級主管部門專控。
